subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The career of the American Jack Sock, 22, who has been compared to the former star Andy Roddick, is back on the upswing after he learned how to keep tennis in perspective.
snippet: The career of the American Jack Sock, 22, who has been compared to the former star Andy Roddick, is back on the upswing after he learned how to keep tennis in perspective.
